long_description: Wear the men's Giro Bike Undershorts made of premium Italian Lycra(R) spandex in a low-profile design under almost any pants or long shorts for a smooth ride. Fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly, so you stay comfortable. Performance chamois pad delivers maximum comfort in the saddle. Quick-access fly makes for smoother restroom breaks. Low-profile leg bands with silicone grippers keep undershorts in place without showing a ridge. Giro Bike Undershorts are made in California.
short_description: Wear the men's Giro Bike Undershorts made of premium Italian Lycra(R) spandex in a low-profile design under almost any pants or long shorts for a smooth ride.
